quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mel Blanc and Character
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, john. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In The Dukes of Hazzard series, there is a number 01 on the side of Bo and Lukes car.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: There was a period when Mel Blanc did the voices of his characters in both his home bed and his hospital bed. What was the reason for this?

options.text: He was in a bad car accident

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was in a bad car accident

questions.question: What fictional character from popular television animated series, The Flintstones, was voiced by Mel Blanc?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Barney Rubble

questions.question: Among Mel Blancs various roles was voicing the old automobile of which comedian?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Benny

questions.question: Which character of The Dukes of Hazzard is known for his strange laugh?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rosco P. Coltrain

questions.question: American voice actor Melvin Jerome Blanc was born in San Francisco, on what date?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: May 30, 1908

questions.question: Mel Blanc joined Leon Schlesinger Studios, a subsidiary of Warner Brothers Pictures, in what year?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1936

questions.question: Which of these characters did Mel Blanc not voice on The Jack Benny Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jacks butler

questions.question: John Schneider was cast in The Dukes of Hazzard in the role of which character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bo Duke

questions.question: What actor played Luke Duke in the original series The Dukes of Hazzard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Wopat

questions.question: What was the name of the family with three daughters on the TV show Petticoat Junction?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bradley

questions.question: Lulu Hogg, played by Peggy Rea, is Roscos sister in the TV series The Dukes of Hazzard.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Daisy Duke, Bo and Lukes cousin in The Dukes of Hazzard series, is a waitress at what place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Boars Nest

questions.question: This orange cat was the last original character, voiced by Mel Blanc.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Heathcliff

questions.question: Boss Hogg, a character in the TV series The Dukes of Hazzard, rides in a Cadillac with what distinguishing feature?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steer Horns
